LOGIN.TITLE: Course Rules Generator
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Log in to edit course rules.

POINT_ONE.TITLE: Point 1 - Recommendations and restrictions for student participation
POINT_ONE.PREREQUISITES_PLACEHOLDER: e.g. completion of Mathematics 1 and Programming Fundamentals

POINT_TWO.TITLE: Point 2 - Rules of required student attendance in classes where attendance is mandatory
POINT_TWO.SELECT_CLASS_TYPE_HINT: Select at least one class type in the shared parameters section to configure point 2.
POINT_TWO.LECTURE_AUTO_TEXT: For lectures, the text is generated automatically.

POINT_THREE.TITLE: Point 3 - Detailed methods of interim/final verification of learning outcomes and types of materials and devices allowed for students during verification of learning outcomes
POINT_THREE.SELECT_CLASS_TYPE_HINT: Select at least one class type in the shared parameters section to configure point 3.

POINT_FOUR.TITLE: Point 4 - Schedule of interim/final verification of learning outcomes, in particular dates of written and oral tests and dates for submitting reports from laboratory exercises and projects, including retake dates if the course specifics allow it
POINT_FOUR.SELECT_CLASS_TYPE_HINT: Select at least one class type in the shared parameters section to configure point 4.
POINT_FOUR.AUTO_GENERATED_SCHEDULE: For this class type, the verification schedule is generated automatically.

POINT_FIVE.TITLE: Point 5 - Options and rules for student participation in additional test and exam dates

POINT_SIX.TITLE: Point 6 - Rules for completing the course and issuing the final course grade

POINT_SEVEN.TITLE: Point 7 - Deadlines and modes for announcing the results of interim/final verification of learning outcomes and grades obtained by students

POINT_EIGHT.TITLE: Point 8 - Rules for improving the results of interim/final verification of learning outcomes and grades obtained by students

POINT_NINE.TITLE: Point 9 - Rules for repeating classes due to unsatisfactory academic results for individual types of classes within the course

POINT_TEN.TITLE: Point 10 - Other information depending on the specifics of conducted classes
